item.title: What is Shirley Card
item.description: Introduction As AI systems continue to evolve and become more sophisticated, they will likely incorporate various types of data, including images, text, and other modalities. We need to be aware of biases in training data and ensuring diverse representationâ€”is still highly relevant for AI developers.
